function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease spread due to poor air quality monitoring and control system","Impact":"Potential outbreak of respiratory illnesses and other health issues","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and calibration of sensors, timely response to air quality alerts","Technologies":"Intelligent wireless sensing and control system, ARIMA prediction model, ZigBee technology","People":"Inhabitants of the areas where the system is deployed","Owner":"Environmental Protection Administration, university, school authorities"},{"Description":"Inaccurate air quality prediction leading to inadequate control measures","Impact":"Failure to mitigate health risks associated with poor air quality","Mitigation":"Regular validation and recalibration of the ARIMA prediction model, integration of real-time sensor data for improved accuracy","Technologies":"ARIMA prediction model, data acquisition system, communication channel technology","People":"Inhabitants of the areas where the system is deployed","Owner":"Environmental Protection Administration, university, school authorities"},{"Description":"Dependency on energy-saving performance validation test for system effectiveness","Impact":"Neglect of critical air quality monitoring and control functions in pursuit of energy savings","Mitigation":"Balancing energy-saving objectives with primary function of health risk mitigation, regular monitoring of actual air quality parameters","Technologies":"ARIMA prediction model, energy-saving performance validation procedures","People":"Inhabitants of the areas where the system is deployed","Owner":"Environmental Protection Administration, university, school authorities"}]}
